verses.verse: וַיַּ֧עַל <WH5927> way·ya·‘al went up ( Israel Rebuked at Bochim) מַלְאַךְ־ <WH4397> mal·’aḵ- Now the angel ( Or Angel; also in verse 4) יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <WH1537> hag·gil·gāl Gilgal אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to הַבֹּכִ֑ים פ <WH1066> hab·bō·ḵīm p̄ Bochim וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> way·yō·mer and said, אַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> ’a·‘ă·leh “ I brought you up אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> ’eṯ·ḵem - מִמִּצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> mim·miṣ·ra·yim out of Egypt וָאָבִ֤יא <WH935> wā·’ā·ḇî and led אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> ’eṯ·ḵem - אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- you into הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH7650> niš·ba‘·tî I had promised לַאֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> la·’ă·ḇō·ṯê·ḵem to your fathers, וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> wā·’ō·mar and I said, לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- ‘ I will never אָפֵ֧ר <WH6565> ’ā·p̄êr break בְּרִיתִ֛י <WH1285> bə·rî·ṯî My covenant אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> ’it·tə·ḵem with you, לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām ...

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> wə·’at·tem and you לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- are not תִכְרְת֤וּ <WH3772> ṯiḵ·rə·ṯū to make בְרִית֙ <WH1285> ḇə·rîṯ a covenant לְיֽוֹשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> lə·yō·wō·šə·ḇê with the people הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ land, הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz·zōṯ of this מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4196> miz·bə·ḥō·w·ṯê·hem their altars. ’ תִּתֹּצ֑וּן <WH5422> tit·tō·ṣūn but you shall tear down וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- Yet you have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֥ם <WH8085> šə·ma‘·tem obeyed בְּקֹלִ֖י <WH6963> bə·qō·lî My voice. מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What זֹּ֥את <WH2063> zōṯ is this עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> ‘ă·śî·ṯem you have done?

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> wə·ḡam So now אָמַ֔רְתִּי <WH559> ’ā·mar·tî I tell you לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- that I will not אֲגָרֵ֥שׁ <WH1644> ’ă·ḡā·rêš drive out [these people] אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> ’ō·w·ṯām - מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> mip·pə·nê·ḵem before you; וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> wə·hā·yū they will be [thorns] לָכֶם֙ Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) in your לְצִדִּ֔ים 6654 Prep-l│N-mp ( lə·ṣid·dîm) sides, וֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם 430 Conj-w│N-mpc│3mp ( wê·lō·hê·hem) and their gods יִהְי֥וּ 1961 V-Qal-Imperf-3mp ( yih·yū) will be לָכֶ֖ם Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) to you. ” לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ 4170 Prep-l│N-ms ( lə·mō·w·qêš) a snare

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> way·hî - כְּדַבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> kə·ḏab·bêr had spoken מַלְאַ֤ךְ <WH4397> mal·’aḵ When the angel יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> had·də·ḇā·rîm words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> hā·’êl·leh these אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> bə·nê the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ..., וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> way·yiś·’ū lifted up הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām the people אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - קוֹלָ֖ם <WH6963> qō·w·lām their voices וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <WH1058> way·yiḇ·kū and wept.

וַֽיִּקְרְא֛וּ <WH7121> way·yiq·rə·’ū So they called שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> šêm- ... הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> ham·mā·qō·wm place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> ha·hū that בֹּכִ֑ים <WH1066> bō·ḵîm Bochim ( Bochim means weepers.) וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <WH2076> way·yiz·bə·ḥū- and offered sacrifices שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> šām there לַֽיהוָֽה׃פ <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD.

וַיְשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> way·šal·laḥ had dismissed ( Joshua’s Death and Burial) ( 60 24:29-33) יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ 3091 N-proper-ms ( yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘) After Joshua אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) הָעָ֑ם 5971 Art│N-ms ( hā·‘ām) the people, וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ 1980 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3mp ( way·yê·lə·ḵū) went out בְנֵֽי־ 1121 N-mpc ( ḇə·nê-) the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) ... אִ֥ישׁ 376 N-ms ( ’îš) each לְנַחֲלָת֖וֹ 5159 Prep-l│N-fsc│3ms ( lə·na·ḥă·lā·ṯōw) to his own inheritance. לָרֶ֥שֶׁת 3423 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lā·re·šeṯ) to take possession of אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הָאָֽרֶץ׃ 776 Art│N-fs ( hā·’ā·reṣ) the land,

וַיַּעַבְד֤וּ <WH5647> way·ya·‘aḇ·ḏū served הָעָם֙ <WH5971> hā·‘ām And the people אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kōl throughout יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> yə·mê the days יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ of Joshua וְכֹ֣ל׀ <WH3605> wə·ḵōl [and] יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> yə·mê - הַזְּקֵנִ֗ים <WH2205> haz·zə·qê·nîm of the elders אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer who הֶאֱרִ֤יכוּ <WH748> he·’ĕ·rî·ḵū outlived יָמִים֙ <WH3117> yā·mîm ... אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> ’a·ḥă·rê ... יְהוֹשׁ֔וּעַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šū·a‘ [him], אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer who רָא֗וּ <WH7200> rā·’ū had seen אֵ֣ת <WH853> ’êṯ - כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śêh works יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> hag·gā·ḏō·wl the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> ‘ā·śāh had done לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> lə·yiś·rā·’êl for Israel.

וַיָּ֛מָת <WH4191> way·yā·māṯ died יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <WH3091> yə·hō·wō·šu·a‘ And Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- son נ֖וּן <WH5126> nūn of Nun, עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> ‘e·ḇeḏ the servant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD, בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- at the age מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> mê·’āh of 110 וָעֶ֖שֶׂר <WH6235> wā·‘e·śer .... שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> šā·nîm ...

וַיִּקְבְּר֤וּ <WH6912> way·yiq·bə·rū They buried אוֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> ’ō·w·ṯōw him בִּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> biḡ·ḇūl in the land נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> na·ḥă·lā·ṯōw of his inheritance, בְּתִמְנַת־ <WH8556> bə·ṯim·naṯ- vvv חֶ֖רֶס <WH8556> ḥe·res at Timnath-heres ( Timnath-heres is also known as Timnath-serah; see and .) בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> bə·har in the hill country אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> ’ep̄·rā·yim of Ephraim, מִצְּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> miṣ·ṣə·p̄ō·wn north לְהַר־ <WH2022> lə·har- of Mount גָּֽעַשׁ׃ <WH1608> gā·‘aš Gaash.

וְגַם֙ <WH1571> wə·ḡam had also כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- whole הַדּ֣וֹר <WH1755> had·dō·wr generation הַה֔וּא <WH1931> ha·hū - נֶאֶסְפ֖וּ <WH622> ne·’es·p̄ū been gathered אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to אֲבוֹתָ֑יו <WH1> ’ă·ḇō·w·ṯāw their fathers, וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> way·yā·qām rose up דּ֨וֹר <WH1755> dō·wr generation אַחֵ֜ר <WH312> ’a·ḥêr another ( Israel’s Unfaithfulness) ( 290 43:22-28) ;  300 2:23-37 אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם 310 Prep│3mp ( ’a·ḥă·rê·hem) After that אֲשֶׁ֤ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) who לֹא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō-) did not יָֽדְעוּ֙ 3045 V-Qal-Perf-3cp ( yā·ḏə·‘ū) know אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - יְהוָ֔ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD וְגַם֙ 1571 Conj ( wə·ḡam) or אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה 4639 Art│N-ms ( ham·ma·‘ă·śeh) the works אֲשֶׁ֥ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) that עָשָׂ֖ה 6213 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ‘ā·śāh) He had done לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ס 3478 Prep-l│N-proper-ms ( lə·yiś·rā·’êl) for Israel.

וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <WH6213> way·ya·‘ă·śū did בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- And the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> hā·ra‘ evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> bə·‘ê·nê in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> way·ya·‘aḇ·ḏū and served אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <WH1168> hab·bə·‘ā·lîm the Baals.

וַיַּעַזְב֞וּ <WH5800> way·ya·‘az·ḇū Thus they forsook אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְהוָ֣ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê the God אֲבוֹתָ֗ם <WH1> ’ă·ḇō·w·ṯām of their fathers, הַמּוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> ham·mō·w·ṣî who had brought them אוֹתָם֮ <WH853> ’ō·w·ṯām - מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> mê·’e·reṣ out of the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> miṣ·ra·yim of Egypt, וַיֵּלְכ֞וּ <WH1980> way·yê·lə·ḵū and they followed אַחֲרֵ֣י׀ <WH310> ’a·ḥă·rê after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm gods אֲחֵרִ֗ים <WH312> ’ă·ḥê·rîm various מֵאֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> mê·’ĕ·lō·hê ... הָֽעַמִּים֙ <WH5971> hā·‘am·mîm of the peoples אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ’ă·šer - סְבִיב֣וֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5439> sə·ḇî·ḇō·w·ṯê·hem around them. וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <WH7812> way·yiš·ta·ḥă·wū They bowed down לָהֶ֑ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) to them וַיַּכְעִ֖סוּ 3707 Conj-w│V-Hifil-ConsecImperf-3mp ( way·yaḵ·‘i·sū) and provoked אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - יְהוָֽה׃ 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD  to anger ,

וַיַּעַזְב֖וּ <WH5800> way·ya·‘az·ḇū for they forsook אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh Him וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <WH5647> way·ya·‘aḇ·ḏū and served לַבַּ֖עַל <WH1168> lab·ba·‘al Baal וְלָעַשְׁתָּרֽוֹת׃ <WH6252> wə·lā·‘aš·tā·rō·wṯ and the Ashtoreths.

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> way·yi·ḥar- burned אַ֤ף <WH639> ’ap̄ Then the anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> bə·yiś·rā·’êl against Israel, וַֽיִּתְּנֵם֙ <WH5414> way·yit·tə·nêm and He delivered them בְּיַד־ <WH3027> bə·yaḏ- into the hands שֹׁסִ֔ים <WH8154> šō·sîm vvv וַיָּשֹׁ֖סּוּ <WH8155> way·yā·šōs·sū of those who plundered אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> ’ō·w·ṯām them. ( Literally of plunderers who plundered them) וַֽיִּמְכְּרֵ֞ם <WH4376> way·yim·kə·rêm He sold them בְּיַ֤ד <WH3027> bə·yaḏ into the hands אֽוֹיְבֵיהֶם֙ <WH341> ’ō·wy·ḇê·hem of their enemies מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> mis·sā·ḇîḇ all around, וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- no יָכְל֣וּ <WH3201> yā·ḵə·lū whom they were ע֔וֹד <WH5750> ‘ō·wḏ longer לַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> la·‘ă·mōḏ able to resist לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lip̄·nê ... אוֹיְבֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH341> ’ō·wy·ḇê·hem -.
